exclusion:
Removing Device To Z-Wave Network:

Once the controller is ready to remove your device, press the Manual/Program button on the smart plug 3 times quickly. The blue LED will blink quickly.

Auto-add mode: LED will blink within 30 seconds after first plugged in.
inclusion:
Adding Device To Z-Wave Network:

Once the controller is ready to add your device, press the Manual/Program button on the smart plug 3 times quickly. The blue LED will blink quickly.

Auto-add mode: LED will blink within 30 seconds after first plugged in.
label: MP21ZP
overview:
Z-Wave Plus Outlet Mini Plug with Power Meter(MP21ZP)

Indoor use in dry location

Power: 120V 60Hz

Loading: 10 Amp Max Resistive

Frequency: 908.42MHz

Temperature Range: 0°C~ 40°C / (32°F~104°F)

Features:

  1. Manual and Remote (Z-Wave) on/off control.
  2. Z-Wave controlled AC outlet for standard incandescent lighting, CFL/LEDs, fans or small appliances(1250W Resistive Max).
  3. Grounded 3-wire power connection for safety.
  4. Remembers and restores on/off status after power failure.
  5. Built-in Z-Wave Plus signal repeater to extend network range.
  6. S2 security and 700 Z-Wave chip for reliable wireless communication.
  7. Work with all certificated Z-Wave controllers

Locally Button Press function:

  1. press 1x: turn output ON or OFF
  2. quickly press 3x: inclusion or exclusion
  3. quickly press 5x: change Parameter 1
  4. quickly press 8x: change Parameter 4
  5. quickly press 10x: Reset KWH
  6. Factory reset: click Z-Wave button 2 twice quickly, then hold for at least 10 seconds.
usage:
Locally Button Press function:

  1. press 1x: turn output ON or OFF
  2. quickly press 3x: inclusion or exclusion
  3. quickly press 5x: change Parameter 1
  4. quickly press 8x: change Parameter 4
  5. quickly press 10x: Reset KWH
  6. Factory reset：click Z-Wave button 2 twice quickly, then hold for at least 10 seconds.

category.label: Power Outlet
category.description: Small devices to be plugged into a power socket in a wall which stick there

parameters.label: LED Indicator
parameters.overview: This parameter can access you to choose the led indicator to be on when the plug(light) is on/off, or LED indicator remains on/off all times

options.label: LED is On when the switch is ON and LED is Off when the switch is OFF
LED is Off when switch is On and LED is ON when the  switch is OFF

parameters.label: Auto Turn-Off Timer
parameters.overview: This parameter can access you to set a timer to make the switch turn off automatically after the switch turned on

parameters.label: Auto Turn-On Timer
parameters.overview: This parameter can access you to set a timer to make the switch turn on automatically after the switch turned off.

parameters.label: Restores state after power failure
parameters.description: Restores state after power failure Setup
parameters.overview: This parameter can access you to set the switch to be on/off after power failure.

options.label: The switch is off regardless of the state prior to power failure
The switch is on regardless of the state prior to power failure

parameters.label: Power Wattage(W) Report
parameters.overview: This parameter determines the minimum change in power wattage(W) that will result in sending new power report to the main controller.

parameters.label: Current(A) Report
parameters.overview: This parameter determines the minimum change in Current(A) that will result in sending new power report to the main controller

parameters.label: Energy(KWH) Report
parameters.overview: This parameter determines the minimum change in consumed energy that will result in sending new energy report to the main controller

parameters.label: Count Down Configuration
parameters.description: Endpoint1 Count Down Configuration (Turn off the output by time）
parameters.overview: Endpoint1 Count Down Configuration (Turn off the output by time）

parameters.label: Count Down Configuration
parameters.description: Endpoint1 Count Down Configuration(Turn on the output by time）
parameters.overview: Endpoint1 Count Down Configuration(Turn on the output by time）

parameters.label: E2 Count Down Configuration
parameters.description: Endpoint2 Count Down Configuration(Turn off the output by time）
parameters.overview: Endpoint2 Count Down Configuration(Turn off the output by time）

parameters.label: E2 Count Down Configuration
parameters.description: Endpoint2 Count Down Configuration(Turn on the output by time）
parameters.overview: Endpoint2 Count Down Configuration(Turn on the output by time）

associations.label: Lifeline
associations.overview:
Association group_1 is default to associate with the primary controller (Gateway/Hub/Controller) for MP21ZP Status change report,

1. MP21ZP will trigger AUTO report function if the Switch status had been changed.

associations.label: Basic set From Endpoint1
associations.overview: When the output of the MP21ZP Enpoint1 socket is changed, On (0xFF) or Off (0x00)or Overload, The MP21ZP will automatically send out a related basic set command. On (0xFF) or Off (0x00) to its associated group.
